name: mischief the monkey
notes:
create your very own adorable amigurumi monkey with this easy-level crochet pattern! mischief the monkey is perfect for crocheters of all ages who love making cute and cuddly toys.
  
>   
> grab an ad-free printable version of
> this pattern here in my ravelry shop
> or [here](https://tidd.ly/454tzs7) in my etsy shop.
>   
> unlike the free version of this
> pattern that is available on my blog,
> this downloadable pdf is ad-free and
> includes exclusive photo tutorials for
> trickier parts of the pattern, that
> the free version does not.
>   
  
**pattern details:**
  
**skill level:** easy
**language:** english
**terminology:** us crochet terms
  
**finished size:** approximately 18.5 inches tall, from bottom of feet to top of head when crocheted to gauge
  
**materials needed:**
  
• 6.0 mm (j) crochet hook
• hobbii toucan yarn (super bulky):
• color a: dark purple (col. 19) - 2 balls
• color b: light purple (col. 17) - 1 ball
• 18mm violet glitter safety eyes
• polyfil stuffing
• scissors, tapestry needle, stitch markers, sewing pins
